product.title: Ecowood Deluxe Blizzard Grey Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
product.description: Build a stunning window arrangement that's both stylish and practical with the ecowood deluxe in blizzard grey fine grain. This sleek collection of quality louvres creates a contemporary venetian blind made from convincing faux wood that's both moisture-resistant and has the ability to be adapted to any surrounding. Craft a chic ambience in your bedroom by hanging the blizzard grey fine grain amidst pastel pink walls and bedlinen.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Cream Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Stockholm cream is a beautiful neutral colour, and works perfectly with cool greys but also natural and wood tones. A real all rounder & great for injecting colour into any room. Their stockholm cream roller blind is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms. Their roller blinds come with various control options, including a spring pull acorn which removes the need for any cords maing them inherently child safe.

relproducts.title: Valencia French Cream Roller Blind
relproducts.description: This valencia roller blind is light cream; think of an extremely milky coffee. Some might say buff or ecru, whatever you call it, it's a very nice neutral shade that adds just enough colour to the window. This colourway is beautiful in both modern settings and homes that favour this valencia roller blind is light cream; think of an extremely milky coffee.

relproducts.title: Rimini Dove - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: The rich simplicity of the rimini in dove is all you need for any room. Neither dark nor light, it allows just a little light to penetrate, and provides you with the privacy you need, when you need it. And this resilient, quality blind will last you well, year upon year. There aren't many colours or styles that the moderating monochrome of the dove won't work with. Set off bright reds, complement deep purples, or tame dazzling limes.

relproducts.title: Rimini Almond - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: The rimini almond is a classic, creamy white offering that's sure to add a touch of elegance to any room. Its fine texture makes it soft to the touch, yet it retains the durability typical of the rimini range. Combine with bold patterns for effortless period chic, or with browns, beiges, and golds for a modern, opulent look. The almond's luxurious finish will particularly suit a living room or bedroom where relaxing is the main goal, but of course would work well in any room amongst most colour schemes.

relproducts.title: Rimini Cream - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: By embracing the simple things in life rimini cream brings you a little touch of luxury right where you need it as you craft your interiors to reflect who you really are. A delicately woven fabric plays host to the rich and calming nature of cream as your mind drifts off to your own personal oasis. Cream works in any room where you want to add that gentle homely touch that brings the rest of your decor together.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Smoke Blue Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Stockholm smoke blue is a soft blue shade, and works perfectly with cool greys but also natural and wood tones. A real all rounder - great for injecting colour into any room. Their stockholm smoke blue roller blind is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms. Their roller blinds come with various control options, including a spring pull acorn which removes the need for any cords maing them inherently child safe.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Dove Grey Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Stockholm dove grey is a light soft grey shade, and works perfectly with cool greys but also natural and wood tones. A real all rounder - great for injecting colour into any room. Their stockholm dove grey roller blind is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms. As with all their made to measure products this blind comes with a 5 year guarantee which covers all parts of the blind.

relproducts.title: Genesis Plain Luxe Soft Cream Roller Blind
relproducts.description: The genesis plain luxe cream offers a simple and stylish enhancement for your windows. This practical roller blind is designed with convenience in mind. Whatever room you hang this blind will also benefit from the dimout effect and uplifting cream colourway that will give the space a bright splash of warmth whatever time of day. Product id: db-rbx1947 fabric colour: soft cream material: 100% polyester lining: colour match polyester backing - see sample headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white steel brackets - top, face or side fix control type: smooth continuous-looped chain energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes genesis plain luxe soft cream roller blind in cream.

relproducts.title: Ecowood Chic Grey Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: Aptly named, the ecowood in chic grey fine grain is as chic as they come. A strong, sophisticated grey is featured on an authentically textured faux wood, formed into wide slats that can be easily adjusted to suit your mood and needs. Grey and yellow is fast becoming a contemporary classic, but have you ever considered going for grey and lime? This funky colour scheme will give a modern kitchen a zesty lift, whilst also maintaining a feeling of stylish chic in your home.

relproducts.title: Ecowood Brilliant White Satin - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: With a timeless look and feel, brilliant white satin from their ever-popular ecowood range offers you a chance to breathe new life into any space. The crisp tone of the white shines through in the background - adding the perfect finishing touch to the contemporary look you've carefully created. We love the idea of pairing brilliant white with crisp white fabrics and light stone grey scatter cushions in the master bedroom.

relproducts.title: Ecowood Pistachio Shell Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: In a gentle, creamy beige, the ecowood in pistachio shell fine grain offers a classic wood texture that adds to its feel of authenticity. The colour is subtle and understated, so it's easily matched, and the wide slats are strong and easy to use. Settle the pistachio shell fine grain against a deep plum purple for a strong and moody bedroom look. Hang the blind on a purple feature wall, painting the others cream or the palest of biscuits, and match bedding and accessories to the plum shade.

relproducts.title: Ecowood Washed White Satin - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: A subtly layered finish creates the standout look that we call washed white satin. The washed out white provides the ideal canvas for the gentle ebb and flow of the grain that comes through the closer you look. For a relaxing ambience that will have you drifting off to sleep in no time at all why not pair washed white with some gentle blue walls and a lightly coloured wooden floor? Ideal for taking you back to memories of the coast as you fall into the deepest sleep the moment your head hits the pillow.

relproducts.title: Ecowood Blizzard Grey Satin - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: A soft and wintery shade, as its name suggests, the ecowood in blizzard grey satin is nothing if not cool, calm, and collected. Its subtle and unassuming tone means it's completely versatile and will work anywhere in the home amidst any dcor scheme. Try the blizzard grey satin in an all-white dining room, using this soft grey as the only colour in the form of furniture, accessories, and of course, the blind.

relproducts.title: Ecowood Absolute White Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: With realistic woodgrain texturing for an authentic feel, the ecowood in absolute white fine grain displays an icy white tone and a matt finish. Alongside thick, sturdy slats, this blind features a matching headrail, pelmet, and bottom rail for a classy, finished look. For a bright and breezy bathroom look, where the water-resistant absolute white fine grain will settle in perfectly, post the blind against clean aqua walls.

relproducts.title: Ecowood Devon Cream Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: The ecowood in devon cream fine grain displays a chalky cream finish, with grain detailing, on wide faux wood slats, complete with a matching pelmet, rails, and control cords. Made from hardwearing materials, and treated for water-resistance, this is a quality blind that will last year upon year. Pair the devon cream fine grain with slate greys for a cool and modern aesthetic. Add furniture in light or painted woods and accent with a hint of pale pink or baby blue to give the look a jot of colourful character.

relproducts.title: Ecowood Penthouse Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: The ecowood in penthouse fine grain offers a luxury, hushed cream tone that wouldn't look out of place in the chicest of homes. A textured surface gives the impression of a true wood grain, and this faux wood offers all the strength and durability of wood as well. Settle the penthouse fine grain amongst rich chocolate browns and muted golds for a feeling of opulent luxury in the master bedroom. Include plush rugs and silky-feel bedlinen, opting for a dark feature wall for a striking focal point.

relproducts.title: Ecowood Brilliant White Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: Brilliant white fine grain combines a calm and pure white with an intriguing texture which adds depth and subtly to any room in the house. As the light catches your eye you'll see how the textured lines gently ebb and flow to give the piece a unique look and feel. Finding the perfect finishing touch for the spare bedroom can be difficult, so why not go in a different direction? The neutral colouring works in any setting, whilst the natural flow of the lines adds a calming presence that will have your guests drifting off to sleep in no time at all.

relproducts.title: Ecowood Castle Grey Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: A regal grey, as its name suggests, the ecowood in castle grey fine grain has a beautifully textured finish and the cool grey is clean and understated. Its wide slats are easily adjustable for versatility of light, air, and privacy, making it an ideal all-rounder. Enhance a stark white wall in a living room or dining room by adding the castle grey fine grain, along with other accessories in varying shades of grey.

relproducts.title: Ecowood Devon Cream Satin - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: The flawless finish of the ecowood in devon cream satin is given by the satin-matt cream paint used to coat the hardwearing faux wood slats. For adjustable light, ventilation, and privacy, simply move and tilt the slats to suit your needs. Insert the devon cream satin into a natural and light decor scheme, furnishing the room with bare and painted wickers, unfinished woods, and organic hessians. Paint the walls in cream or oatmeal and include a large jute rug for added rural flair.

relproducts.title: Ecowood Blizzard Grey Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: Reminiscent of a wintery storm, the ecowood blizzard grey fine grain takes a cool, icy toned grey that just screams laidback chic. The grainy texture of this faux wood looks and feels authentic, and there's the added bonus of moisture-resistance and strong durability. Team the blizzard grey fine grain with a monochrome colour scheme in a contemporary living room. Stick to pure white walls and add in furniture in varying tones of black and grey, throwing in some plush fabrics to counteract the hard lines and colours.

relproducts.title: Ecowood Country Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: Convincingly textured to produce the look and feel of genuine wood, the ecowood in country fine grain is in fact formed from hardwearing pvc. This faux wood material has the added advantage of being water-resistant, making it an ideal choice for a family bathroom or kitchen. Go all-out outdoorsy in your living room by partnering the country fine grain with forest and grass greens and natural, organic browns.

relproducts.title: Ecowood Chateau Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: In true french style, the ecowood in chateau fine grain has a demure, understated tone, making it ideal for homely, vintage feel. Matching rails and control cords provide complete colour coordination, so that you can be sure that nothing will distract from this pretty, faux wood blind. Incorporate the chateau fine grain into a romantically styled bathroom, where the tiling is a creamy off-white and the walls are painted in pale vintage pink.

relproducts.title: Ecowood Espresso Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: With all of the neat good looks of wood and functional practicality of a venetian, the ecowood in espresso fine grain displays a dark brown wood effect on hardwearing slats. This quality faux wood is water-resistant and won't crack or warp, making it ideal for bathrooms and kitchens. Influence your kitchen with a soft monochrome scheme, going for brown or soft black worktops similar to the espresso fine grain and creamy off-white units.

relproducts.title: Ecowood Fruitwood Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: With a dark mahogany tone, and a grained finish, the ecowood in fruitwood fine grain has a truly authentic look and feel, belying its pvc material. This durable, long-lasting blind is water-resistant so you can be sure that it won't warp or crack. Merge the fruitwood fine grain with duck egg blue walls in a traditionally styled living room. Incorporate polished wood furnishings and matching duck egg accessories, adding in a hint of teal for a quick burst of bold colouring.

relproducts.title: Origin Magnolia - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: The queen of neutrality, the magnolia version of their origin aluminium range is a simple choice that will match almost any colour it's paired with. Its satin finish and colour-coordinated cords provide it with a streamlined look that only the best of neutrals can achieve. If you love colour-blocking and continuation, go as far as setting the magnolia amongst matching magnolia walls, resulting in a clean, aerodynamic feel in a living room, hallway, or kitchen.

relproducts.title: Wood Grain Effect 25mm Golden Oak Aluminium Venetian
relproducts.description: Golden oak wood grain effect 25mm aluminium venetian blinds are a light to mid brown wooden shade. This colour will look fabulous with elegant creams and neutrals within the home or office. Product id: db-dven0378 fabric colour: golden oak s25065 material: aluminium headrail: co-ordinating slimline aluminium headrail - face or top fix brackets slat width: 25mm slat material: aluminium control type: cord & wand energy saving rating: er1 - lowest energy saving value - due to blind type or fabric light filtering: yes wood grain effect 25mm golden oak aluminium venetian in brown.

relproducts.title: Turin 25mm Gloss Cream Aluminium Venetian
relproducts.description: Their range of turin 25mm aluminium venetian blinds blend simplicity with functionality, and are perfect for the office - home or away. A warm tone, this jersey cream venetian blind adds a warm light cream shade to your home. Match with other grey tones for a modern style, or mix with wood accessories for a chic finished look. At swift direct blinds, quality is important to us which is why not only is this venetian blind made by their team of experts, but it also comes with a free five year guarantee.
